resources.string:
Hi my name is Gabriel 

I love android and I will make good use of this programming abilities
 I use android since Gingerbread
 and have seen updates coming since then right
 until Pie was unveiled including
 the new Q release
 my first device was a samsung galaxy tab and have owned several
 google nexus devices.
 I am also an iOS developer
 and am excited about the new MacOS iPad app abilities
 Also in the future I want to develop for this awesome new ecosystem
 but at the core will always be an android fan
